text: Óscar Serrano González (born October 12, 1973 in Madrid) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a vision problem, and he is a T12/B2 type athlete. He competed the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in the T12 1,500 meter race. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Óscar Serrano González
